author: per curiam
text:
552 U. S. ____ (2007)552 U. S. ____ (2007)552 U. S. ____ (2007)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESBOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT OF
THE CITY OF NEW YORK, PETITIONERv.TOM F., on behalf of
GILBERT F., a minor childon writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the second circuit[October 10, 2007]Per Curiam.The judgment is affirmed by an
equally divided Court.Justice Kennedy took no part in
the decision of this case.
